about_the_game:
THE LAST HUMAN IS A BIKER (TLH) combines shooter and runner mechanics to deliver a fast-paced gameplay, spiced up with roguelite elements.

"2666, an alien invasion destroyed the USA. John is the only survivor, the last human. Embark in a vengeful adventure on the United States devastated roads, and destroy alien scums with big guns and tasty punchlines."

Drive - Kill - Die - Repeat


Survive as long as possible.
Collect resources to upgrade your stash.
Start again with your new toys.

Gear up and kick ass


Choose your starting weapon and bike.
Smash some aliens to level up.
Upgrade your gear to the top.
Make yourself the real boss.

The right tool for the right man


Combine your modules with no limit.
Find the funniest combination possible.
These various combinations will make each game unique.

Show your friends who's the best


Score the most points in each mode.
Take position in the online leaderboard.
Support them or make fun of them.
That's up to you.

Shut up and take my punchlines


“Since it's the '90s, you don't just smack a guy in the face. You say something cool first.” - Joe Hallenbeck (Bruce Willis) in The Last Boy Scout.

This game is a tribute to 90s movies and series masterpiece, from THE RENEGADE to AKIRA, including MAD MAX and STARSHIP TROOPERS. Every breath you take, prepare for a shower of cultural references to awaken Nostalgia.

short_description: THE LAST HUMAN IS A BIKER (TLH) is a few hours of pure entertainment. In this 2D shooter you play as John, the last human, and unleash his fury in his quest of vengeance! With unlimited item synergies, make the choices that will allow you to survive against countless swarms of aliens!
